scene: Beach gym - REX AND VLADIMIR FACE OFF

camera_position.starts: Two-shot - Rex standing, Vladimir in chair

REX.description: Delta Force veteran, trying to stay retired
REX.wardrobe: Army PT shorts, no shirt, dog tags

sequence_breakdown.visual: REX faces VLADIMIR who sits in chair eating, armed men behind
REX steps forward aggressively, muscles tensed
sequence_breakdown.dialogue: [REX SPEAKING]: I told you, I'm retired, Vladimir.

sequence_breakdown.visual: VLADIMIR doesn't look up, takes bite of chicken
VLADIMIR flicks wrist lazily while holding chicken
REX FLIES BACKWARD through air from invisible force
REX crashes into pull-up bar, BENDS it, lands in sand
VLADIMIR finally looks up, grease on chin
sequence_breakdown.dialogue: [VLADIMIR SPEAKING]: Nobody retires from me, soldier boy.

visual_requirements: Rex flies DRAMATICALLY from small gesture
ONE line from Rex, ONE from Vladimir
